page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER IN ERDINGTON
page.content: Erdington Police Station is the busiest in "D" Division. 130 Police Officers work here in shifts. During each shift 2 traffic cars and 4 Panda cars are on duty. The most common crimes in the area are theft of cars and theft from cars. l983 l984 To May 1985 Theft of cars 1192 1367 548 Theft from cars1152 886 426 The part of Erdington where most crimes occur is the High Street due to the amount of shoplifting and break-ins. Crime is increasing, in 1983 there were 7743 crimes; in 1984 8032 and up to May 1985 3233. The times of the year when crime increases is during the Summer holidays and near to Christmas. In 1985 robberies and rape have been the most serious crimes reported in Erdington. Glue sniffing is also on the increase.
